comment: This professor is inflexible, offering no consideration even for emergencies or technical issues. He claims fairness means treating all students the same, ignoring individual situations. His teaching lacks originality and uses all materials from another professor. I regret investing my time and money in this course due to the poor experience.

I had the pleasure of taking a data mining course with Professor Jacob, and it was an outstanding experience. His teaching style is simple and straight to the point, making complex concepts easy to understand. What truly sets him apart is his ability to integrate practical examples from his extensive real-world experience in retail and healthcare

He changed the syllabus constantly throughout the semester.
He was late to class every week.
He had IT issues every week.
He had no interest in the slides, as he was reusing them from a different professor.
He never gave feedback. I turned in an entire project and 8-page paper and he didn't look at either.

His tests were very short and very easy.
Dr. Jacob genuinely likes to teach
He made me genuinely interested in the course work. It was a good experience.
